## Owner's Financial Context

| Factor | Value | Impact |
|--------|-------|--------|
| **Primary Income** | W-2 Employment | SE tax only applies to LLC income |
| **W-2 Income Range** | $50K-$100K | 22% federal bracket |
| **Filing Status** | Single | Standard deduction: ~$14,600 |
| **Current Retirement** | None | Huge opportunity for tax-advantaged savings |
| **Employment Status** | Full-time W-2 | ID8Labs is side business |

### Tax Bracket Analysis
- Current W-2: 22% federal bracket
- Additional LLC income will be taxed at marginal rate (22-24%)
- Self-employment tax: 15.3% on LLC profits
- **Effective rate on LLC profit: ~37-39%** (before deductions)

## Key Insights for Agents

### For SENTINEL (Compliance)
- No current deadlines since LLC not formed
- Once formed: May 1 annual report will be first obligation
- Estimated taxes not required until income exceeds withholding

### For LEDGER (Accounting)
- Pre-revenue means tracking expenses now = future deductions
- Home office: Simplified method simplest for dedicated area
- All software tools are 100% deductible business expenses
- Need receipt capture system ASAP

### For FILER (Procedures)
- Priority filing: Articles of Organization (Sunbiz)
- Then: EIN application (immediate, free)
- Operating agreement template needed

### For ADVISOR (Legal/Tax)
- Disregarded entity appropriate for now
- S-Corp evaluation: Not relevant until profit exceeds ~$50K/year
- Asset protection: Operating agreement + separate bank critical

### For STRATEGIST (Tax Optimization)
- 22% bracket + 15.3% SE = aggressive deduction hunting valuable
- No retirement contributions = huge opportunity
- SEP IRA or Solo 401(k) consideration once revenue exists
- R&D credit potential for software development

### For GUARDIAN (Risk)
- Low risk profile (pre-revenue, no clients)
- Priority: Operating agreement + separate banking
- Insurance not urgent until client work begins

### For COMPTROLLER (Financial)
- No revenue/expenses to track yet
- Banking setup is priority
- Expense tracking system needed before spending begins

### For MONITOR (Regulatory)
- BOI reporting: Not required for domestic LLCs (as of Mar 2025)
- No active regulatory concerns at planning stage

### For MENTOR (Teaching)
- Owner has "some basics" - not complete beginner
- Wants aggressive optimization - teach risk/reward tradeoffs
- Prefers delegation - teach systems, not manual tasks
- Key knowledge gaps: execution mechanics, gray areas
